str2: A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pro and lambano; to take in advance, i.e. eat before others have an opportunity; to anticipate, surprise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
A falling away, lapse, slip, false step, trespass, sin. From parapipto; a side-slip, i.e. error or transgression.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Spiritual. From pneuma; non-carnal, i.e. ethereal, or a spirit, or supernatural, regenerate, religious.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From kata and a derivative of artios; to complete thoroughly, i.e. Repair or adjust.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Wind, breath, spirit.
Mildness, gentleness. From praus; mildness, i.e. humility.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To look at, regard attentively, take heed, beware, consider. From skopos; to take aim at, i.e. regard.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 2nd Person Singular
str2: Of yourself.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.
